summary: During WW2, a platoon of Marines crash-lands on a tiny Pacific island occupied by a small Japanese unit.
cast: Tatsuya Mihashi|Takeshi Katô|Homare Suguro|Kenji Sahara|Masahiko Tanimura|Tôru Ibuki|Ryûchô Shumpûtei|Hisao Dazai|Susumu Kurobe|Takashi Inagaki|Kenichi Hata|Frank Sinatra|Clint Walker|Tommy Sands|Brad Dexter|Tony Bill|Sammy Jackson|Richard Bakalyan|Rafer Johnson|Jimmy Griffin|Christopher Dark|Don Dorrell|Phillip Crosby|John Howard Young|Roger Ewing|Richard Sinatra|Joe Gray|Laraine Stephens
keywords: whiskey|cigar smoking|man uses crutches|no female character|island
title: Todos eran valientes
